amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit the federal government from entering into an agreement to establish a heritage partnership program in nine counties in southeast Colorado.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A078) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A078) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A078) offered by Mr. Buck.
